#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <vector>
#include <limits>

using namespace std;

int main() {
        vector<int> rnum(100000, numeric_limits<int>::max());
        rnum[0] = 0; rnum[1] = 1; rnum[2] = 2;
        for(int i = 3;i < 100000;i++) {
                int k = i/2;
                while(k > 0) {
                        if(i % k == 0) {
                                int localMin = rnum[i - k] + 1;
                                if(rnum[i] > localMin) {
                                        rnum[i] = localMin;
                                }
                        }
                        k--;
                }
        }
        int t, n;
        cin >> t;
        while(t > 0) {
                cin >> n;
                cout << rnum[n] << endl;
                t--;
        }
        return 0;
}
